title: Ep 151: The Big Beauty Ep with Michelle Lee
itunes:title: Ep 151: The Big Beauty Ep with Michelle Lee
itunes:subtitle: Kate cultivates a self-care plan for 2021 and Doree is ready to pick up every item and see if it sparks joy. Then they’re joined by Michelle Lee, the editor of Allure Magazine and co-host of the podcast Allure: Science of Beauty, to discuss looking you...
description:
Kate cultivates a self-care plan for 2021 and Doree is ready to pick up every item and see if it sparks joy. Then they’re joined by Michelle Lee, the editor of Allure Magazine and co-host of the podcast Allure: Science of Beauty, to discuss looking your best on zoom, having a baby at 44, why she pushed to stop using the term “anti-aging,” and what she thinks about the idea of a perfect product. Plus, she answers lightning round questions about her favorite products.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

Allure: The Science of Beauty - Come get nerdy with Allure! New episodes every Thursday. Listen to Allure: The Science of Beauty wherever you get your podcasts.
